question: {name} is looking for a new {property_type} that will not go beyond her ${budget} budget. She saw a property that has a selling price of ${price}. On top of that, the buyer has to pay a brokerage fee which is {brokerage_fee}% of the selling price, and also the transfer fee that is {transfer_fee}% of the selling price. If {name} can get {discount}% discount on the selling price, how much more will be the total cost than {name}'s budget?
